Params: {3: 'The howling wind and snow make it hard to see or hear anything.'}
{3: 'With a flash of blue light, two figures appear in the snowstorm.'}
{3: 'The blizzard stops her questions. She looks to her side, having gotten used to having a companion.'}
{3: "In the whiteness, she can't see anything, as if she is the last one left in the world."}
{3: 'She suddenly feels anxious, fearing the teleportation has gone wrong.'}
{3: "Hearing your familiar voice, Ishmael's face relaxes with relief, and the blizzard seems to slow down."}
{3: 'She watches a red wisp drift from her fingers, weaving through the snowflakes and spreading silently.'}
{3: 'The time travel terminal starts blaring an alarm too.'}
{3: 'Cracks appear in the space, like a mirror shattering.'}
{3: "The scene from that day flashes before Ishmael's eyes."}
{3: 'Screams, explosions... blood splattered on the walls, colleagues dying in front of her.'}
{3: 'The red keeps spreading. Everything here seems tiny compared to the Punishers.'}
{2: 'The Punishers might follow our time trail.', 3: '68'}
{3: 'Scenes from the past flash through your minds.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "No... then I'll... I'll stay. You go.", 4: '1', 18: '100006674'}
{3: 'Her hands tremble slightly. She reaches out and grabs your fingertips.'}
{3: 'The shout silences Ishmael—she has never heard you use such a stern voice.'}
{3: 'But that "go back" is said with such tenderness.'}
{3: 'Ishmael feels you put something in her hand, but she is too distracted to see what it is.'}
{2: "And you're the best of us, so—", 3: '84'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I've seen too much time flow past... too many friends fall... without proper goodbyes.", 4: '1', 18: '100006676'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I can't... see you go like this.", 4: '1', 18: '100006677'}
{2: "We don't say goodbye. Just do this for me.", 3: '93'}
{3: 'The rift grows larger. You can see the Punishers trying to widen it.'}
{3: 'A blue light flashes across the snow.'}
{3: 'When the Punishers step into the snow, only a lone figure and a red-glowing time travel terminal remain.'}
{3: 'After this, the space will become a mess, and the Punishers won\'t find your "trail in snow".'}
{3: 'A huge explosion tears the surrounding space apart.'}
{3: 'The shards become glass before turning into book pages.'}
{3: "A red light rises from the book's pages, its trail turning into a thin red line."}
{3: 'A hand grabs the red line, and the shards of consciousness come back together.'}
{3: 'Ishmael looks at her hand, where a wooden 20-sided die lies.'}
